IndividualConfig.AllowedHint: Allow players to configure their sheetexcel settings Individually

IndividualOverride.AllowedHint:
Allow players to override specific keys for cell references.
This can also be changed on a per-sheet basis.

SHEEXCELREFRESH.NoSheetURL: No sheet URL set. Enter a Google Sheet URL in the settings sidebar and click Update Sheet.

HeaderOption.IdentifierHelp: Turns the resulting data into a identifier; a bit of text fit to serve as a key for a key/value pair.
HeaderOption.FormatValueHelp: Formats the value of the field.  ${Value} can be used as a placeholder for the unformatted value.

SHEEXCELREFRESH.AreYouSure:
Are you sure you want to remove this {thing}?
This action cannot be undone.
SHEEXCELREFRESH.DoYouWantTo: Are you sure you want to {action} this {thing}?

Error.FailedLoadingConfig: Config for {actor} failed to load! Error message: {error}
